top_repos.name: langgraph
top_repos.description: Build resilient language agents as graphs.

top_repos.name: agent-chat-ui
top_repos.description: 🦜💬 Web app for interacting with any LangGraph agent (PY & TS) via a chat interface.

top_repos.name: deepagents
top_repos.description: Deepagents is an agent harness built on langchain and langgraph. Deep agents are equipped with a planning tool, a filesystem backend, and the ability to spawn subagents - making them well-equipped to handle complex agentic tasks.
